sqlMap.sql: SELECT ID, COMPANY_ID, CARD_NAME, CARD_IMAGE_SRC FROM MEMBER_CARD_TEMP WHERE ( 1 = 1 ) <#if id?exists && id!=""> And ID=:id </#if> <#if companyId?exists && companyId!=""> And COMPANY_ID=:companyId </#if> <#if cardName?exists && cardName!=""> And CARD_NAME=:cardName </#if> <#if cardImageSrc?exists && cardImageSrc!=""> And CARD_IMAGE_SRC=:cardImageSrc </#if> <#if oderbyField?exists && oderbyField!=""> Order by ${oderbyField} </#if> <#if oderbyAscOrDesc?exists && oderbyAscOrDesc!=""> ${oderbyAscOrDesc} </#if>
INSERT INTO MEMBER_CARD_TEMP (ID, COMPANY_ID, CARD_NAME, CARD_IMAGE_SRC) VALUES ( :id, :companyId, :cardName, :cardImageSrc)
UPDATE MEMBER_CARD_TEMP SET COMPANY_ID = :companyId, CARD_NAME = :cardName, CARD_IMAGE_SRC = :cardImageSrc WHERE ID = :id
